review: The Apple TV is a very nice small low power product which allows me to connect from my MacBook Pro to my tv screen and audio from anywhere in the house, over the wi-fi. I can show hi definition video or just my computer screen, in 1080p. It also will play audio files from my iTunes account, although the iTunes program must be open on whatever computer you want to play from. The TV/Movie connections are almost all subscription, which I'm not going to use. TV shows from the iTunes store are priced at $3.99, which is too high unless there are special circumstances.

review: I have put off buying this forever, finally took the plunge last week, wish I had spent the $99 years ago.  If you have an IPad, of Mac in the house, then this is a wonderful device to have.As with all Apple devices, it works seamlessly with all of them, easiest set up I have ever had, connect HDMI cable, power cable, and login to your accounts.The minimalistic remote is a joy, three button, wow, only potential problem is it's so small.Works on 802.11 g/n, guessing they will add 802.11ac soon, amazing performance on such a small unit.HIGHLY recommend
